jouvieje.bass.defines

Interface BASS_TAG


  • public interface BASS_TAG
    BASS_ChannelGetTags types : what's returned [NAME] BASS_TAG

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BASS_TAG_APE
      APE tags
      static int BASS_TAG_APE_BINARY
      + index #, binary APE tag : TAG_APE_BINARY structure
      static int BASS_TAG_CA_CODEC
      CoreAudio codec info : TAG_CA_CODEC structure
      static int BASS_TAG_FLAC_CUE
      cuesheet : TAG_FLAC_CUE structure
      static int BASS_TAG_FLAC_PICTURE
      + index #, picture : TAG_FLAC_PICTURE structure
      static int BASS_TAG_HTTP
      HTTP headers : series of null-terminated ANSI strings
      static int BASS_TAG_ICY
      ICY headers : series of null-terminated ANSI strings
      static int BASS_TAG_ID3
      ID3v1 tags : TAG_ID3 structure
      static int BASS_TAG_ID3V2
      ID3v2 tags : variable length block
      static int BASS_TAG_LYRICS3
      Lyric3v2 tag : ASCII string
      static int BASS_TAG_META
      ICY metadata : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_MF
      Media Foundation tags : series of null-terminated UTF-8 strings
      static int BASS_TAG_MIDI_TRACK
      + track #, track text : array of null-terminated ANSI strings
      static int BASS_TAG_MP4
      iTunes/MP4 metadata
      static int BASS_TAG_MUSIC_INST
      + instrument #, MOD instrument name : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_MUSIC_MESSAGE
      MOD message : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_MUSIC_NAME
      MOD music name : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_MUSIC_ORDERS
      MOD order list : BYTE array of pattern numbers
      static int BASS_TAG_MUSIC_SAMPLE
      + sample #, MOD sample name : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_OGG
      OGG comments : series of null-terminated UTF-8 strings
      static int BASS_TAG_RIFF_BEXT
      RIFF/BWF "bext" tags : TAG_BEXT structure
      static int BASS_TAG_RIFF_CART
      RIFF/BWF "cart" tags : TAG_CART structure
      static int BASS_TAG_RIFF_DISP
      RIFF "DISP" text tag : ANSI string
      static int BASS_TAG_RIFF_INFO
      RIFF "INFO" tags : series of null-terminated ANSI strings
      static int BASS_TAG_VENDOR
      OGG encoder : UTF-8 string
      static int BASS_TAG_WAVEFORMAT
      WAVE format : WAVEFORMATEEX structure
